thread.title: Jamie Carragher makes his co-commentary debut - football fans remind us they don't take change well
thread.title_full: Jamie Carragher makes his co-commentary debut - football fans remind us they don't take change well

author: Row Zed
title: Jamie Carragher makes his co-commentary debut - football fans remind us they don't take change well
text: But it was Carragher's debut that a lof of viewers wanted to discuss...and not necessarily in a good way... Of course Gary Neville was quick to take the mick And some viewers agreed that they couldn't understand Carra Lots of viewers said that Some just were not fans Some didn't appreciate his choice of wording Well that's a just a cheap shot It's fair to say his debut was not well received Some were wishing for Neville to come back Some just went in hard And even when the compliments came, they were backhanded poll loading Are Carragher and Neville the best football punditry double act you've ever seen? 3000+ VOTES SO FAR
